mapper.select: SELECT hos_id, group_id, copy_code, check_id, check_code, detail_id, inv_id, inv_no, batch_no, bar_code, location_id, cur_amount, chk_amount, price, inva_date, disinfect_date, note FROM med_check_detail WHERE hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and check_id = #{check_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and detail_id = #{detail_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT mcd.inv_no, mcd.inv_id, mid.inv_code, mid.inv_name, mcd.batch_no, mcd.bar_code as sn, mcd.bar_code, round(mcd.price, ap.para_value) as price, mcd.chk_amount-mcd.cur_amount as amount, round(mcd.price*(mcd.chk_amount-mcd.cur_amount), ap1.para_value) as amount_money, case when (mcd.inva_date is null or mcd.inva_date = '') and mid.is_quality = 1 then case ap2.para_value when '0' then null else sysdate + ap2.para_value end else mcd.inva_date end as inva_date, mcd.disinfect_date, nvl(mid.is_per_bar,0) is_per_bar, mid.is_highvalue FROM MED_CHECK_DETAIL mcd left join med_inv_dict mid on mcd.group_id = mid.group_id and mcd.hos_id = mid.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = mid.copy_code and mcd.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mcd.inv_no = mid.inv_no left join acc_para ap on mcd.group_id = ap.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap.copy_code and ap.mod_code = '08' and ap.para_code = '08006' left join acc_para ap1 on mcd.group_id = ap1.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap1.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap1.copy_code and ap1.mod_code = '08' and ap1.para_code = '08005' left join acc_para ap2 on mcd.group_id = ap2.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap2.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap2.copy_code and ap2.mod_code = '08' and ap2.para_code = '08009' where mcd.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mcd.check_id = #{check_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.chk_amount - mcd.cur_amount > 0 order by mcd.detail_id asc

SELECT mcd.inv_no, mcd.inv_id, mid.inv_code, mid.inv_name, mcd.batch_no, mcd.bar_code as sn, mcd.bar_code, round(mcd.price, ap.para_value) as price, mcd.cur_amount-mcd.chk_amount as amount, round(mcd.price*(mcd.cur_amount-mcd.chk_amount), ap1.para_value) as amount_money, case when (mcd.inva_date is null or mcd.inva_date = '') and mid.is_quality = 1 then case ap2.para_value when '0' then null else sysdate + ap2.para_value end else mcd.inva_date end as inva_date, mcd.disinfect_date FROM MED_CHECK_DETAIL mcd left join med_inv_dict mid on mcd.group_id = mid.group_id and mcd.hos_id = mid.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = mid.copy_code and mcd.inv_id = mid.inv_id and mcd.inv_no = mid.inv_no left join acc_para ap on mcd.group_id = ap.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap.copy_code and ap.mod_code = '08' and ap.para_code = '08006' left join acc_para ap1 on mcd.group_id = ap1.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap1.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap1.copy_code and ap1.mod_code = '08' and ap1.para_code = '08005' left join acc_para ap2 on mcd.group_id = ap2.group_id and mcd.hos_id = ap2.hos_id and mcd.copy_code = ap2.copy_code and ap2.mod_code = '08' and ap2.para_code = '08009' where mcd.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND mcd.check_id = #{check_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mcd.cur_amount - mcd.chk_amount > 0 order by mcd.detail_id asc
